debug_unit_path.description: [unit]Path to the debug unit. If the debug option is on for viewing encounters, this unit will be visible where the encounter is.

radius.description: Things inside this radius will be considered 'in an encounter'.

move_speed.description: The encounter will move towards the closest 'vip'-target (avatar).

preferred_distance.description: The encounter will not move towards target if it's closer than this.

min_spawn_distance.description: Spawn points will be at least this far from the encounter entity

max_spawn_distance.description: Spawn points will be at most this far from the encounter entity
